definitions.example: The dog poop is on the grass.

definitions.definition: The sound of a steam engine's whistle; typically low pitch.
To make a short blast on a horn

definitions.example: His horse pooped right in the middle of the parade.

definitions.definition: To tire, exhaust. Often used with out.
definitions.example: He pooped out a few strides from the finish line.

definitions.definition: To break seawater with the poop of a vessel, especially the poop deck.
definitions.example: We were pooped within hailing of the quay and were nearly sunk.

definitions.definition: To embark a ship over the stern.
